statements: SELECT * FROM legislative_records WHERE bill_number = 'HB12345';
SELECT record_id, bill_name FROM legislative_records WHERE status = 'Passed';
SELECT * FROM legislative_records WHERE date_introduced BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT bill_name, status, date_enacted FROM legislative_records ORDER BY date_enacted DESC;
SELECT bill_name, status, date_enacted FROM legislative_records WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY bill_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM legislative_records WHERE status='Passed' ORDER BY date_enacted DESC;
SELECT bill_name, bill_number, status FROM legislative_records WHERE date_introduced >= '2022-01-01' AND date_enacted < '2023-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM legislative_records WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT bill_name, bill_number, date_introduced FROM legislative_records WHERE status='Failed' ORDER BY date_introduced ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM legislative_records WHERE date_introduced BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE bill_number = 12345;
SELECT bill_title, status FROM bills WHERE introduced_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, bill_title, status FROM bills ORDER BY introduced_date DESC;
SELECT law_title, enactment_date FROM laws WHERE law_number = 54321;
SELECT id, law_number, description FROM laws ORDER BY enactment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY introduced_date DESC;
SELECT law_title, enactment_date FROM laws WHERE enactment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT bill_number, bill_title, introduction_date FROM bills WHERE bill_number IN (1001, 1002, 1003);
SELECT * FROM bills JOIN laws ON bills.id = laws.id WHERE bills.status = 'Passed';
SELECT DISTINCT status FROM bills;
SELECT * FROM bills;
SELECT bill_name, introduced_date, status FROM bills WHERE status='pending';
SELECT law_id, law_name, enactment_date FROM laws ORDER BY enactment_date DESC;
SELECT legislator_id, full_name, party_affiliation, district FROM legislators WHERE party_affiliation='Republican' ORDER BY full_name;
SELECT bill_name, status FROM bills WHERE introduced_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT bill_name, status FROM bills ORDER BY introduced_date DESC;
SELECT legislator_id, full_name, party_affiliation, district FROM legislators WHERE party_affiliation='Democratic' AND district='NY';
SELECT bill_name, status FROM bills WHERE introduced_date > '2021-01-01' AND status='Passed' ORDER BY introduced_date ASC;
SELECT law_name, category FROM laws WHERE enactment_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM bills;
SELECT bill_name, bill_type, bill_status FROM bills WHERE bill_status='pending';
SELECT legislator_name, legislator_party FROM legislators ORDER BY legislator_name DESC;
SELECT committee_name, members_count FROM committees WHERE members_count > 10 ORDER BY members_count ASC;
SELECT law_name, law_type, enactment_date FROM laws WHERE enactment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE bill_status = 'pending' ORDER BY introduced_date DESC;
SELECT bill_name, bill_type FROM bills WHERE introduced_date >= '2022-01-01' AND introduced_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT legislator_name, legislator_party, legislator_email FROM legislators WHERE legislator_party = 'Democrat' ORDER BY legislator_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM laws WHERE enactment_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY enactment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT committee_name, committee_chair, members_count FROM committees WHERE committee_type = 'Senate Committee';
SELECT bill_title, date_proposed FROM bills
SELECT * FROM laws
SELECT committee_name, committee_chair FROM committees ORDER BY committee_name DESC
SELECT legislator_name, party_affiliation, district FROM legislators WHERE party_affiliation='Republican'
SELECT bill_title, sponsor_name, date_proposed FROM bills WHERE date_proposed > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM bills;
SELECT bill_title, sponsor_name, date_proposed FROM bills WHERE sponsor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT law_title, date_passed FROM laws ORDER BY date_passed DESC;
SELECT committee_name, committee_chair FROM committees WHERE committee_chair = 'Jane Smith' ORDER BY committee_name ASC;
SELECT legislator_name, district, party_affiliation FROM legislators WHERE party_affiliation = 'Republican' AND district IN ('ABC', 'XYZ');
